How am I meant to live if living has no merit. I need to dig deeper.
These fragmentations are me- each lamenting their own story, yet all wailing the same truth:
A pain so pure and distilled across eternity. The Kind that cannot fade, cannot end, cannot even blink.
When I listen to these wails- these shattered echoes of my past- the realization coils around my neck in horror:

And endless cycle where death would be mercy. If i was to perish now, I will simply wake up again. But they are not shown this mercy, forced to relieve their incomplete stories for eternity while mine waltzs' onward.
Is this all some cruel joke? A script where every choice has been set in stone from the beginning? Am I just foolishly written ink on some cosmic page?
What am I- A tool? A Vessel? A wound that will never close?

I see only one path forward: augment everything. My body. My tools. My mind’s defenses. If those fragmented reflections of myself return—if they corner me again—I won’t survive the torture awaiting my mind and body.
So I’ll carve the answers from this world’s living essence. From the forests. From beasts. From my own veins, if necessary. I will spill rivers of blood to map the way of my own unique purpose.
This war against my own echoes begins now. Even if it consumes me I will oppose whatever this will is.

ftbquests.chapter.digital_roots_ae2_basi: You have to power your ME system for it to work. The energy acceptor is the cheapest and easiest way to do this. Slap some power into this baby and you're good to roll.
Autocrafting in AE2 can be slightly confusing for newer players.
Crafting storage is how complex a craft can be. Basically, more storage means bigger crafts.
Crafting Co-Processor allows for mutiple things to be crafted at once. Basically, more things being crafted at the same time, rather than one by one.
These illuminated panels are purely decorative blocks and don't serve any functions.
However, they are needed to craft terminals.
The ME Terminal allows you to acess the items you stored in the cells. Very simple.
Makes your ME System send out pattern batches more frequently, allowing your autocrafts to keep up with faster machines.
You'll need to use these plenty as you progress and you will also want to multiply the size of your patterns to help as well.
This big guy can carry a full 32 channels.
However, this cable can't connect to most devices you can use on a smart cable.
They can however connect to GT AE2 Parts without issue.
This bad boy is used to simulate a crafting table. Craft all the things your heart desires!
The ME Crafting Terminal does everything the regular Terminal does, but with an added 3x3 crafting GUI that lets you craft things with the items you have.
Autocrafting requires patterns, and to encode those patterns you need this bad boy.
Channels are enabled by default in Frontiers and thus are required in a normal playthrough.
Disabling Channels, while allowed, will Invalidate you from acquiring the "&4Frontiers Dominator&r" Role. - Which is only given to players playing with &cstock settings or harder&r.
(You will still be eligable for the "&aFrontiers Conqueror&r" role.)
The AE2 "GUIDE" Is absolutely amazing for info related to Ae2, and explains it better than I ever could.
Important Info Regarding Channels, and Pack Challenge Roles
Lets you see all of the Pattern Providers on your system as well as access their patterns.
This nifty thing lets you see all the things are you are requesting with the ME Requesters.
Does the same thing the regular Pattern Access Terminal does, but lets you search for patterns based off its inputs/outputs.
The ME Requester will automatically request items once it falls below a threshold count set by you.
You can set the amount to craft once it reaches below that threshold.
Crafting cards are much cheaper, but come without many of the benefits a ME Requester
The Quantum Ring lets you carry 32 channels to anywhere, including cross dimensions.
Use Quantum Entangled Singularities to link rings.
Finally, wireless channel transfer... if you can ignore the cost.
Ouch, That's a &lLOT&r of Mana Steel. Well it's the best we can make rn.
A Small price to pay for logistical dominance.
Unlike in regular AE2, you have to craft the housing and then craft it with the component to combine them.
Same thing goes for the other types of cells you might want to make such as fluid ones.
ME Smart Cables and its dense counterparts are the only available AE2 cables. Have fun crafting these! :)
These cables are only able to carry 8 channels.
Cable anchors can be used to seperate 2 lines of cables. (Or use different color ones)
Quartz Fiber is used to send ONLY power to a subnet. No channels will go though a quartz fiber.
Different colored cables do not connect with each other.
Be careful with regular ME Smart Cables as they connect to everything.
Exporters exports stuff &6OUT&r of your system,
Ah yes, the ME Drive. Make some drives and put shove em in here. It'll allow you to view your stored items and fluids across all your ME network.
Note, these can be placed beside eachother and can carry 8 channels.
AE2 Devices run on channels. Each device uses 1 channel. Regular Smart Cables are able to carry 8 channels and dense ones 32.
Each side of an ME Controller supplies 32 channels. You can chain ME Controllers together to make a bigger controller.
Slap this on an external storage that's not part of your system and make it part of your system.
Cell Workbench allows you to filter your cells. Very useful to keep your drives clean.
ME I/O port lets you very quickly, empty or fill cells.
&6P2P&r or Point 2 Point are devices that can transfer things from one point to another, as the name suggests.
By using a memory card, you can select an input side, then you can select output sides.
Think of &6P2P&r as a tunnel with mutiple ways out. You have a way in and it goes from that entrance to the exits.
&6P2P&r do NOT push or pull. You have to make sure whatever you're inputting is being pushed into the tunnel.
Speeds up devices. Speed is life!
Increases the amount of items you can request in export busses.
Also increases the amount of items you can filter in storage busses.
Lets you export/filter things without worry about NBT data.
Put this in an interface/export bus and it will autocraft the item you're exporting.
You have to have a pattern for the item you're requesting.
The extended ME Pattern Provider and Interface can both hold 36 unique items/patterns.
These are a great way on using less space for your automation setups
An ME Drive with double the space. Storage cell away!
Extended Molecular Assembler is extremely powerful.
It is 2x faster than regular Molecular Assemblers and can run 8 crafting jobs at once.
You will need co-processors to utilize all 8 parallel.
ME Chest is very useful when you need to check the contents of one drive.
Provides you with all the cobblestone you could ever need.
There are many cells that can store things. If you want to store something, it can probably go in a cell.
They each require a diffrent housing so be prepared for that.
Adds very useful devices that are direct upgrades of existing ones, as well as new ones.
These types of storage busses allow you to better sort the things that you want to be stored externally.
Better versions of the existing import/output busses.
Ridiculously fast way of emptying or filling your storage cells.
The ME Stocking Bus has two modes: Filtered and Autopull.
In Filtered Mode, you can select up to 16 items to automatically pull into your multiblock machine.
In Autopull Mode, the Stocking Bus will auto-pull the first 16 items in your AE Network!
Use this with subnets to create powerful automation setups for your base!
The ME Stocking Hatch has two modes: Filtered and Autopull.
In Filtered Mode, you can select up to 16 fluids to automatically pull into your multiblock machine.
In Autopull Mode, the Stocking Bus will auto-pull the first 16 fluids in your AE Network!
Use this with subnets to create powerful automation setups for your base!
These are just like the bus version.
ME Output Busses allow you to directly insert into your ME System from GT Multiblocks.
ME Output Hatches allow you to directly insert into your ME System from GT Multiblocks.
Oh boy, the ME Pattern Buffer is a bit complicated, so stick around!

ME Pattern Buffers can hold 27 patterns. One of their key features is that all recipes in the buffer will never conflict (this is currently broken, but it’s fixed in GTM 1.7.0, and this message will be removed then). This means you can do much more in one machine than before.
Each Pattern Buffer shares three things with all patterns placed inside:
- Any items in the Shared Item Slots
- Any fluids in the Shared Fluids Slots
These features allow you to do more with each buffer. A great example is using one fluid solidifier for all your patterns instead of several.
These blocks get even stronger in future tiers, but you’ll have to wait until then.
The ME Pattern Proxy is a powerful tool when paired with the ME Pattern Buffer.
You can link proxies to buffers using a datastick to pair them.
When linked, Pattern Proxies will emulate ALL patterns, storage, and shared circuits/inventories of their linked buffer.
This allows you to share buffers from one machine with proxies on many others, enabling much stronger and more parallelized crafting than before.
Don’t forget to multiply your patterns!

To HV!

After visiting the Aether, it feels as if a part of my being has become whole again. I was prepared to explore an unfamiliar landscape in the skies, and yet everything felt familiar. This sense of familiarity allowed me a brief moment of respite from these headaches.

Questioning why this is the case, unfortunately, causes the headaches to come back stronger than before—and any attempts to define myself within this environment have resulted in agonizing migraines. It’s almost as if there’s a force working against me. Maybe my adventures near the Sculk caused a fungal infection to take root.

For now, I’ll focus on tangible things in front of me until the cause of these headaches is alleviated. On one notable occurrence: one of these sparkling glass shards I keep finding reacted violently to a blueberry bush, and I instantly remembered the taste of a plant I’ve never tried.

I’ve come to know these shards of glass as "Perpetuity". There’s no other way to explain these fragments of glass—they feel like a part of me. I’m just unsure how yet. The missing link might lie deeper within the confines of this mental repository I’ve been reading and writing into.
I will have to keep exploring to understand further.
&r&7Story Entry 3 | Description Hidden Until Completed
Observe a Berry Bush in the Aether
Recall the past.
Recollection

I don't know what else to write here.
Perpetuity seems to reject any object, physical or otherwise, that isn’t directly bound to me. It only reacts when I apply a will or desire onto the glass surface.
It’s the same tune the shard responded to—the entire song. I can’t help but wonder if there are others out there. I should try to establish some level of contact beyond the planet I inhabit.
I tried to eat it; it became bread.
I tried to throw it away; it became garbage.
I tried to crush it; it became as solid as the earth.
I tried humming a tune, and the shard vanished.
A calming tone echoed around me, and my mind became clearer once again.
Once more, I attempted to ask myself, “Who am I?”
The headaches are gone. However, as I frequent the Aether, a soft humming can be heard.

Welcom to Steam!
Oh boy, your first significant usage of &abronze&r starts here.
Most, if not all, machines in the &eSteam Age&r will utilize some kind of bronze in crafting, be it the casing or the parts needed. Expect to make a lot!

&eWrought Iron&r cooks into &eSteel&r faster alongside &eCoal Coke&r. Doing this in the &6Industrial Primitive Blast Furnace&r with &aWrought Iron Blocks&r reduces the total time per steel ingot by a whopping &b50&r%%!

Oh hey, You're curious about why I made this?
Well in all honesty, I made it as a way to root future magictech to a foundation system rather than 'magic bullshit go!'

Rune Lang is effectively a conlang, and/or not a language at all, it takes inspiration from Greek, Hebrew, and other literary context sources. Don't expect literal or perfect translations, and there are probably errors all over the place! The tooltips might be changed later to only reflect the ideas each rune presents vs showing 'word - description' as it can lead to confusion of native language speakers!
Anyway, rambling over, enjoy a frontiers original magic system. It MIGHT get some custom mechanics later but no promises!

ftbquests.chapter.safe_travels__ev.quest: Welcome forth to the age of &5EV&r
This is where your &eautomation skills&r will be put to the test, as &bprocessing chains&r and &bgeneral chemistry&r grow more complex as your plans unfold.
Upon my attempts to establish connections with sentient worlds, all I am met with is silence.
A place known as Alfheim has been destroyed here, and echos many stars share the same fate.
I was provided with the designs to call out to the stars, potentially hope hasn't been lost.
A piece of technology allowing emulation of complex arcana discovered in Alfheim.
Alfheim had many unique materials, many of which are suitable for chemistry with non-standard materials, i should invest into the creation of these materials.
Virtue Pylons, what seem to be beacons and spatial markers for calling out to the stars.
I will need to construct a ritual in hopes of hearing back from any living being.
Follow the guide within the lexica botania. or Ponder a Beacon (TODO)
This time, a headache— not from questions, but from actions.

After calling down an accidental hostile force, I am almost certain they are of my design—a fragment of me. Every shard of Perpetuity on me exploded into violent static the moment it touched down. A violent whirl of emotions tugged at me, almost ripping my mind apart.
What are they? Who am I? And unfortunately I am almost certain there are more of them.
I need industry, and I need weaponry. I feel a large-scale conflict with these fragmentations will result in a demise worse than death.
The corpse has turned into orbs of resplendent marbles. I can only assume this is a rarer type of Perpetuity— one I can’t create myself.
I will name them "&eVirtue Essence&r" for ease of documentation.
&bVirtue Meld&r is an unique composition of several exotic materials you've acquired so far; And the essence of a dead being but that isn't important
Due to it's steep cost in &aluminite&r, it is now strongly advised to passive &aluminite&r.
Please for the love of god passive &aluminite&r -
Do not do what I did -
I had 6 &3IV&r &eEBFS&r all on Prismatic Tungsten Coil and holy moly it was just really slow
If you've gotten here, you've most likely made everything you need for IV.
It is most likely a good time to set up permanent power infrastructure, if you haven't already as power cost will inflate from here onwards
Supercritical Steam Will have more uses outside of power in the future, but for now I would just vent your SC Steam.
Long Answer - Large Steam Turbines produce very low power outputs for steam/SC Steam
Supercritical Steam Will have more uses outside of power in the future, but for now I would just vent your SC Steam.

You will need to provide at least one Mechanical Flower to this multiblock and the respective resources. On average the yield of potent mana is much higher than the amount of raw mana you'd recieve by using the botania flower.

The &eAlloy Blast Smelter&r handles many advanced alloying recipes, some of which may have extreme magical properties.
A better power delivery system is needed to avoid frying your furnace entirely— ironic, right?
After my near-death encounter with that hostile force—the one that made the world itself tremble—I can’t help but question:
Am I trapped here? Or is this a world I’ve known before?
Perpetuity pulses like a second heartbeat now. It recoils from anything that opposes me, as if rejecting possibilities that shouldn't exist.

This place… it’s too familiar. Every action I take leaves a hollow ache in my chest, like grieving for something I’ve forgotten. The connection is undeniable, yet every attempt to uncover the truth is met with violent resistance either in mind or in reality.
I must mentally prepare for the worst, and keep pushing forward, I believe I am almost to a conclusion here.

My Research still needs to be completed, and I must continue down this path.

Psi, short for Strong Psion Force. - A wave force within our multiverse. Psi acts like a compass and glue for things, potentially even directing chemical bonds or quarks to make more complex molecules or particles. However, unlike other forces within a standard universe, this one permeates through things more frequently on the edge of chaos. Which is why it's most commonly found residing around living beings. A state of chaos that is unique in every universe.

There is a high chance this contributes to the vast empty spaces between different universes or glues them all together in a way I have yet to understand. All I know is it has the potential to change everything.

Here you will be creating your first sources of energy, creating new machines, and automating new technologies.
It may feel overwhelming to you at first, but take it at a pace that feels comfortable.
I would recommend you start to batch craft things; for those not familiar, this is the process of making many of the same item versus just what you need.
This will make things like &ecircuits&r and &amotors&r less annoying in the long run.
Electricity not Included!
&eTurn on the Lights!
Allows you to make fibers, coils, and more!
This machine handles the creation of coils instead of the assembler.
This machine spools things
The Electric Blast Furnace (EBF) — get used to it, as you’ll be using this multiblock frequently.
This multiblock uses &chigh temperatures&r to melt down metals you normally &ncan’t&r smelt.
However, for the seasoned GregTech players in the crowd, &esome things have changed&r.
&lNOTE ; Some Issues have arrised to cause Multiblock heat and the heat-network to postpone into 0.6.X&r

When a valid recipe is found, the EBF will enter &6a warm-up phase&r. Once the EBF reaches the temperature required to smelt your recipe, the process will begin as normal. Preheating consumes &nhalf&r the EU the recipe requires per tick. Make sure you account for the extra needed power!

EBFs cool down to the dimension’s &bambient temperature&r when not in use. In the case of the Overworld, that’s ~&e300 Kelvin&r (300K). Some dimensions are &chotter&r or &bcolder&r, and as you’d guess, this means EBFs are more or less efficient depending on where they’re located.
Much later on, you’ll be able to feed EBFs heat from external sources, keeping them &cpre-heated&r for faster usage.
Hot Furnace
You need 2 of them.
The &eEnergy Acceptor&r allows you to power an AE2 network before you have ME Controllers. You can use this to set up drives and a crafting terminal for early digital storage.
Putting power in AE2
&7This quest desc is a WIP with 90%% of them in LV.&r
Drawing more than the maximum amps a cable can support will cause it to melt shortly after or start fires. This is &4Also bad&r
If it isn't evident at first, Max &eAmps&r on Wires multiplied by the &avoltage tier&r is the Max &bEU/t&r a cable can support.
GregTech Energy (&bEU&r) is split into two features "&aAmps&r" and "&eVolts&r"
&eVoltage&r is the capacity one "&aAmp&r" can contain per package of energy.
When producing EU, all that matters to you is your EU/t, which is calculated by
(&bEU&r = &eV&r * &aA&r)
&l&4NEVER. MIX. VOLTAGES.&r Plugging a higher base voltage into lower-tiered machines will cause an explosion.
Example&r : Do not plug a cable carrying &nMV&r &eVoltage&r (&e128 EU per amp&r) into an &nLV&r machine (&e32 EU per amp&r) this will end &cpoorly.&r
&aAmperage&r ("&aAmps&r") is a limit to how much energy a cable can carry.
&4READ THIS OR EXPLODE
I understand... I think...
POWER SYSTEM WARNINGS
Useful for cutting apart glass and other fragile things.
Useful for Diamond Plates.
Slicing things apart
Allows the collection of higher quality gems from your purified ore!
More Gems!
The &eCentrifuge&r allows you to separate compounds into their base components.
It’s especially useful for getting &aglue&r, which makes your circuit boards even cheaper!
Do not huff the glue.
No.
PUT THE CELL DOWN!
Round and round we go
The &aPolarizer&r lets you create &emagnetic rods&r using EU instead of wasting so much redstone.
As you progress, you’ll need higher-tier polarizers!
Better Magnetic Rods
One prevalent issue starting LV is being unsure of what machines to create, as there is a wide variety.
The quests here serve to help subtly guide you towards good machines and help you visualize what you'll get by crafting each to a rough degree.
But what to make...
So Many Machines!
Need a battery? well this machine is perfect for you!
Sodium batteries are nice for battery buffers early on!
Battery Machine
Feed your ores to this and it will clean and extract bonus resources from them.
There's also a circuit setting to just wash items, with no byproducts.
Washing The Dirt Away
Allow creation of liquid rubber, with a fluid solidifier allows much cheaper rubber plates.
Easier Rubber
Steam is arguably the worst method of generating power due to its low EU density per millibucket.
You’ll want to move away from steam power as soon as possible. You can continue using it if you really want to, but it’s not recommended.
Unfortunately, it is the only option at first that makes sense.
Your first source of power!
You can create Arsenic Trioxide by combining Cobaltite and Oxygen in an EBF.
You will need this to get Arsenic as Realgar doesn't spawn in the Overworld/Nether
The 2nd step
Be careful, make sure you're wearing some kind of respirator! Or you'll get sick over time and die!
At last, Arsenic
If you’re having trouble, look into how to extract gallium from sphalerite. There are at least two ways to process it currently.
- Thermal Centrifuge Purified Sphalarite
- Electrolyze sphalarite dust for a 5%% chance per recipe
Sphalarite's a Friend
Gallium Arsenide is commonly used for Silicon Boules and
Almost to diodes!
An upgrade to your &ehigh pressure steam bender&r, now with an integrated circuit and automated output control!
Plate now powered
You'll need a decent amount of these to make your first MV machines.
Though don't get too excited, you need manasteel first!
Batch crafting is your friend

The Enchanting Aparatus works similar to the malum spirit altar, except it can also consume source as a recipe input. I would recommend crafting a 'Worn Notebook' and reading up on ars to become more used to it.
A New Crafting Tool
Enchanting Aparatus
Circuits are a good bulk of your cost in progression, i would &lalways&r recommend making much more than you need.
Welcome to Gregtech, Again
Your First MV Circuit
You will need an EBF to smelt this metal! Return to this quest once you have built an EBF
EBF Only
The two main generators you’ll use after ditching steam are &eGas Turbines&r and &eCombustion Generators&r.
Both have their benefits and drawbacks. I’ll list them below:
&l&aGas Turbines&r
Cheaper on raw materials but requires 2 circuits per generator.
&l&aCombustion Generators&r
Cheaper on circuits but requires more raw materials.
Look at the fuels each one uses and decide which setup you’ll enjoy building!
I’ve listed some common starting points for both attached to this quest.
Getting serious!
Better Power Sources
&bOil spouts&r spawn natrually all around the world.
Collect some &aoil&r and distill it into your choice of fuel, i would recommend &elight fuel&r!
Oil Spoils
Benzene can be a reliable fuel source early on if you’re willing to invest in it.
You can produce it by extracting &acharcoal&r into &awood tar&r and then distilling the tar into &abenzene&r in MV, but for now you can use steam cracked light oil.
Wood Good
&aGas Turbines&r will burn any gas fuel to produce &eEU&r.
Each generator produces &a1 Amp&r of power.
Stinky!
&aCombustion Generators&r will burn any liquid fuel to produce &eEU&r.
Each generator produces &a1 Amp&r of power.
Stinky!
The Mixer is useful for combining dusts you’ve been mixing by hand, as well as helping you mix fluids and items together.
You’ll need this for Blue Alloy as well, if you haven't built an EBF yet this is your notice to go work towards one.
Will it blend?
Things from steam, smaller, faster and better!
Machines you've made!
An oily but fiborus plant useful for creating magebloom fiber.
You'll need this to create manasteel cables
Magical Fibers
Plenty sturdy fibers for making cloth, as well as decent magical insulation when woven right.
It looks pretty
Thick Fiber
Stress units are useful for powering create contraptions.
You can create Steam Engines to create huge amounts of SU.
It's been told there are ancient ruins that hold other sources of SU, if you wish to hunt them down.
Your Source of SU
Placing &ablaze burners&r under your boilers and fueling them will create more SU from your &esteam engines&r.
Unlike Basic Burners, Blaze Burners can also accept lava as a fuel!
Hotter!
Basic burners an do blaze burner recipes, but without needing to find a blaze.
Only downside is you can't feed a burner blaze cake for the super-heated effect.
Cheap Blaze Burner
Create contraptions for simple farms are one of the few ways you can automate crops/trees early on.
If you need crops the GT way, check out the floral propagator
Later on you have access to the aboral growth chamber too.
Options for early farming
[Note] I need a &bspirit altar&r to unlock this quest.
I need a way to imbue larger volumes of raw mana into devices without them melting, exploding, or shattering.
Runes, as a fundamental force, are a perfect source for this! While rudimentary, I can bind two runes into a pair by taking a part from each.
The new slate produced—I’ve coined them Conjunctions—represents a binding of two rough ideas.
I’ve poured what magical resins I have onto them, and I can feel a faint sense of longing or other vague emotions. I wonder if their interference with the local ether tugs on my mind.
Mana Resonance
&eAluminium&r is used in the creation of several MV parts and casings.
You will need a lot of this, so make sure you are always smelting some!
Shiny new Metal
Crude Source Oil will have more usages in the future, notably a custom chain.
For now you can use it for Manaweave cloth and your first Manasteel
Slick!
Crude Source Oil Extract
A crude mixture of biomass and nether stone
There's a few ways to produce netherrack dust, check them out!
Nether Fertilizer
You can make these in any order!
These quests are here to provide you some beneficial info on the function of each machine.
Some new Additions
New Machines
These curious "plants" seem to be a fungus colony that excretes a solid similar to the plaque on my teeth... but it also glows.
This place scares me.
Rocks but not.
&aOverloaded pearls&r are the fruits of &ePropellplants&r, that have engourged on an surplus of nether sediments.
Handle with care, they are volatile!
Slightly explosive
Bioslurry is an understatement, this foul mixture contains plenty of sediment and plant matter from the nether. It may prove useful if brewed with magebloom.
Some very rough goop
Nether Bioslurry
Weaving threads around this rune conjunction and dousing it in a crude magic solution causes the mana to bond into a stronger cloth known as Manaweave.
This new cloth should be sufficient for wrapping cables imbued with higher volumes of mana.
If not, I expect a fire or small explosion spraying volatile acids all over the place.
Woven slate fabrics
Manasteel is required for MV machine hulls, you'll be able to make it more efficiently in the future. However for now you will have to make it in an EBF
For now you can keep enough mana on the metals surface by wrapping it in manaweave and soaking it in crude source oils. Some of the cloth is lost in the process
A Sturdy Metal
The Circuit Assembler allows you to create LV circuits much cheaper, as well as MV's.
Soon you'll even get a better tier of LV circuits you can use forever.
Cheaper Circuits!
Congrats on getting through LV, you're almost ready to move onto MV, i would recommend improving your gear before moving forward
Congrats!
&fAlmost Ready for MV
There are a handful of AE2 recipes you can do in LV, although they are pretty expensive.
I would suggest migrating over to AE2 over time, as it is worth it to have access to everything across your base.
ME Controllers at last!
You have access to manaweave now!
You can use this to make phenolic boards much cheaper than before.
Cheaper Phenolics
You’ll need either Sodium Persulfate or Iron III Chloride to produce Phenolic Circuit Boards.
Since you’re already here, my guess is you’ve made at least one of them.
A little tricky
&bIron III Chloride&r is one of two options for etching phenolic boards early on, and usually what most people prefer to craft first.
I trust you're familiar enough with EMI now that you can figure out how to make this.
Option 1
Sodium Persulfate is another option for etching your first phenolic boards.
I trust you're familiar enough with EMI now that you can figure out how to make this.
Option 2
Rose gold allows the creation of gold coated storage upgrades and backpacks!
Go upgrade your chests!
Gold Upgrade!
Has more upgrade slots and storage than an iron chest.
Remember you can transport sophisticated storage containers around if you wrap them using &etape&r.
Better chests
Gold Storage Upgrades
Has more upgrade slots and storage than an iron backpack, and piglins will ignore you!
Better Backpack
Providing better pickaxes to the dimensional mineshafts yield brilliance, useful for AE2 controllers
Dimensional Mines, again
Your main method to collect souls, there are some pretty fun enchants for this weapon too.
There's an enchant that lets you even throw it!
A very fun weapon
Pieces of souls from slain enemies.
You’ll find many uses for these in the future, as well as options to automate their collection.
For now, you’re just going to have to slice apart mobs. If you haven’t invested in making an XP farm, this is when I’d recommend it.
Fragments of stolen souls
Any Spirit crystal
Any Spirit Crystal
Spirit Altars accept any amount of spirit crystals and items (placed on pedestals) around the altar to imbue new items.
You can automate this process by using a crate and conveyors for passive/active production  of certain ingots.
Spiritual Imbuement
An upgrade to your &ehigh pressure steam wiremill&r now with an integrated circuit and automated output control!
More Wires Please!
Now that machinery has a rising concentration of magical components, it’s best to ensure it’s as well-insulated as the electrical and mechanical parts of industry.
A good insulator
My Idea worked! Spooling Manaweave around Manasteel vastly improves the materials performance.
These are the best cables you can make in LV.
When wrapped, they become superconductors, losing 0 EU per block.
Needed for MV Hulls, consider using some for your EBF too!
Better Cables
Manasteel Cables
Enther the Aether, a cold paradise in lower earth orbit
To Climb Higher
Travel to the Aether
You only need 10 of these at a minimum, you can make 14 if you like to fill your portal corners in.
This used to have a different method to get looked pretty different as well.
Aether Portal Frame
Check this box to unlock the MV Chapter
To MV!
Trivia: The ID for everything "Soul Stained Alumina" is actually soul_stained_steel. There are two reasons for this:
1. The material from Malum was originally called "Soulstained Steel," but since the recipe now uses aluminum, it no longer makes sense to keep the name.

2.  The GT Material is named the same because the change to "Aluminum" as the base material came too late in the dev cycle to update everything. Keeping the name also makes debugging easier, as everything remains searchable with similar or identical names.
If your ingots say "Soulstained Steel", verify that your resource pack order has KubeJS at the top!
You'll need plenty of these for MV, so make sure to get a good setup for bulk Soul Alumina!
A pretty important plate
&eEthanol&r extraction from &aOverloaded pearls&r was removed; you will have to produce power via other GT production means (benzene/oil/steam, etc).
Why isn't my power working!?
While I've mostly completed the LV chapter, I'm still not entirely happy with it.
I'll make small tweaks to it over the time from 0.6.0 to 0.7.0
A WORK IN PROGRESS!
HEY YOU
Something was here, but I can’t remember.
I am not allowed to remember. Whether it’s an outside force or my own biology, something tugs at my mind as I ponder.
While my understanding of the soul is basic, I can sense latent damage to my own vessel. My attempts to fortify it for Nether travel were not sufficient.
I should look into a method that can gently heal the scars dug deep into my being.
The best place to look is up into the skylands known as the Aether.
These headaches must be cured.
Story Entry 2 | Description Hidden Until Completed
Reveal a Memory
Consistent Headaches
Just like your large steam assembler, useful if you want more assemblers.
Your Large Steam Assembler is better for bulk crafting for now.
Assembling in LV
Allows you to solidify fluids into various shapes, this pairs greatly with machines like the &eChemical Reactor&r and &eExtractor&r
Shapes of plates and more
Just like with the nether, there is a variety of equipment you can utilize to survive in the aether.
- Armor that grants 'Cold Resistance', notably Manaweave armor and 'Heat Coating' will help.
- Hot blocks like campfire/magmablocks/lava can help keep you warm in a emergency
- "Heating Stone" (NYI) will heat you up as long as it is warm (durability)
- Consumables that grant 'Hot Food/Drink' or Cold Resistance potions
TODO; Ice Resistance Potions
The Aether is also thin on air so keep that in mind
Aether Survival Guide
Surviving the upper atmosphere
Surviving the Frost
This booklet contains all the functional information regarding malum, all wrapped up in a well written journal.
Just make sure to double check EMI as the recipes inside the book do not change!
A guide to malum
Automatically stores all spirit crystals you collect with your scythes
Spirit Crystal Storage
Raw Source, an oily-like substance that permeates most objects in this world.
You can extract Source using Sourcelinks. Check out the worn notebook for a more in-depth description of what each one requires.
To start with, I’d recommend either the Volcanic or Argonomic Sourcelinks, as they’re the most straightforward to understand.
A new kind of magic
Any Sourcelink
Sourcing Source
Source can be moved from jar to jar using source relays and the rod of dominion.
You can link them together by right clicking.
Later on you can move source around through your AE2 system, how cool is that!
(Todo; Introduce Source Hatches for GTMulties) - Sometime in the future :)
Locomotion
Getting Source from here to there!
Annealed Manasteel is useful for MV machine hulls, as it can handle higher currents than regular Manasteel.
Even better mana steel

Your First Coil

Naquahine and The Superfuel use it
Coils need it
materials need it

holding onto pain...

This Rocket is considerably more expensive than your previous rockets, allowing you to travel to two new locations- Venus and Mercury.
&eMercury&r and &eVenus&r both have unique atmospheres allowing some machines to process better recipes than before.
Notably, the &6Polymerizer&r is only able to be used on &bVenus&r, and Unlocks doubling your plastics as well as &eNylon-6,6&r

&cDev Note; They are pretty barren, I would like to add some more structures but Worldgen is something I am afraid of and need to take the time to learn in the future. For now just getting access to them for Crafts/Resources will be established, but in the Future/Beta I will take the time to clean up the planets and make them more unique.&r

It is heavily recommended you wait until a proper mid-progress patch is made for ZPM; if you wish to advance foward and accept the risks, force-complete this quest.

The ritual 'well of suffering' allows you to damage mobs nearby the ritual to automatically refill the LP of the blood altar, this is your first serious way to generate LP until later.
Later on (After T5 Blood Orb) you'll be able to craft machines capable of outputing LP into your soul network automatically

The moment you pour it, the world falls eerily silent—then comes the crack.
Now the marble glows a stained purple hue. And it won't let go of your hand.

Welcome to Crystal CPU's, a much harder CPU core than Nano or Quantum. And require a multi-dimensional setup to fully automate. Some pointers before you start.
Space Lithography and Circuit Assembling Can only be done in the orbit of earth. This may change, but just assume earth-orbit is where you'll set up most of Crystal Circut processing
The processing of Dulumixal Naq Boules can only be done in a permanently hot enviroment.

The Orbital Tempering Forge has a plethora of useful recipes, And can run EBF recipes in parallel at the cost of a constantly supplying it Pyroflux, It's prone to jamming if supply is cut so make sure to constantly feed your forges (They consume less when idle)
Trivia Time

"Heavily Refined Silica" used to be called "Sifted Silt" - Which made Crystal CPU's "Silt Line". Which scared people due to the premotion of silt coming from "Water Line" and the trauma inflicted by GTNH.
Dulumixal Naq used to be called "Chromatic Naq" but was deemed too fancy as Chromia and Other Primal Color elements have yet to be introduced into mainstream production.
The process for asembling your crystal circuits will require an adventure to the orbit of earth.
No other field of microgravity will work, please make sure you set this up in the orbit of earth.
